New Records: Sri Lanka scored 124/5 in 17 overs, the highest score in the match; Pakistan scored 121/9 in 19.1 overs
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 5 wickets; Pakistan lost 9 wickets in their chase
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elected to bowl first after winning the toss; Dasun Shanaka led Sri Lanka, while Babar Azam led Pakistan
Post-Match Reflections: Sri Lanka's victory was significant in their journey at the Asia Cup 2022
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was live-streamed on Star Sports and Disney Hotstar; played at Dubai International Stadium
